title: Chart Calculation Request
description: Request schema for POST /api/calculate-chart endpoint. Provides birth data for Human Design chart calculation.

birth_datetime.description: Birth date and time in ISO 8601 format (local timezone)

birth_timezone.description: IANA timezone identifier for birth location

birth_latitude.description: Birth location latitude in decimal degrees

birth_longitude.description: Birth location longitude in decimal degrees

name.description: Optional name for chart personalization (not used in calculations)
